pages.text: TODO: fixI've decided to fight my urges for technological growth and instead forge a new path, one that returns to a more sustainable lifestyle. Instead of large industrial plants, pumping smokestacks full of carbon dioxide into the atmosphere, I will direct my attention to solving the world's food crisis. While we can survive without electricity, Everyone needs food, and this way I wont continue polluting.
I feel a warmth in my chest as I make the decision to avoid another climate disaster. This way may be simpler but I'm sure that I will get used to this, and the world will thank me.
